content.question: Which of the following most likely contributed to the emergence of the Second Great Awakening?

choices.label: The rise of the Whig Party
The election of President Andrew Jackson
The cultural responses to the Enlightenment
The emergence of a womenâ€™s rights movement

content.answer: The cultural responses to the Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
